item.title: First Brands Sues Founder’s Brother, Largest Creditor for Fraud
item.description: Bankrupt auto-parts maker First Brands Group has sued Edward James — its former executive and the brother of company founder Patrick James — and its largest creditor Onset Financial for conspiring “to defraud creditors out of billions of dollars and property.”

item.title: Amazon Has Big Hopes for Wearable AI — Starting With This $50 Gadget
item.description: Several months after Amazon.com Inc. bought artificial intelligence hardware startup Bee, the company said it’s working to make its $50 always-listening wearable more proactive, and indicated a larger revamp is in store.

item.title: Hedge Fund D1’s SpaceX Bet Fuels Its 39% Private Book Gain
item.description: D1 Capital Partners’ portfolio of private investments climbed 39% last year — powered by a bet on Elon Musk’s SpaceX, which nabbed an $800 billion valuation last month.

item.title: Amazon Is Planning Walmart-Style Big Box Store Near Chicago
item.description: Amazon.com Inc. is planning a 229,000-square-foot store selling groceries and general merchandise in the Chicago area, a fresh attempt at physical retail that borrows from the big-box store model of such competitors as Walmart Inc. and Target Corp.

item.title: Trump’s $200 Billion MBS Order Asserts New Power Over Markets
item.description: With his directive ordering Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac to buy $200 billion of mortgage bonds, President Donald Trump has opened a new front in the administration’s effort to bolster housing affordability.

item.title: OpenAI, SoftBank Invest $1 Billion in Stargate Partner SB Energy
item.description: OpenAI与软银集团共同向基础设施公司SB Energy注资10亿美元。该公司正与科技企业合作，在美国大规模建设数据中心以支持人工智能发展。【原文：OpenAI and SoftBank Group Corp. have jointly invested $1 billion in SB Energy, an infrastructure company that’s working with the tech firms on a massive US buildout of data centers to power artificial intelligence.】

item.title: Labor’s Share of US GDP Drops to Record Low in Data Back to 1947
item.description: The portion of US economic output that goes to workers in the form of wages and salaries plunged to the lowest level on record in the third quarter of last year, data from the Bureau of Labor Statistics show.

item.title: 为何实际上并不存在所谓的“唐罗教条”
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读本期通讯，这里汇集了Odd Lots世界每日的精彩内容。有时是我们——乔·韦森塔尔和特蕾西·阿洛威——为您解读市场、金融与经济领域的最新动态；有时则是我们专家嘉宾和信息源网络的贡献。无论内容如何，我们保证始终引人入胜。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: Take-Two股价下跌，因《侠盗猎车手VI》延期消息引发误解
item.description: 《侠盗猎车手VI》最初宣布将于2025年秋季发售，后推迟至2026年5月，再延期至2026年11月19日——即当前计划的发售日期。【原文：“Grand Theft Auto VI’ was first announced for fall 2025 before slipping to May 2026 and then again to Nov. 19, 2026, its current planned date】

item.title: Apple Shares on Pace to Match Longest Losing Streak Since 1991
item.description: 苹果公司股价正朝着追平三十多年来最长连跌纪录的步伐迈进。【原文：Apple Inc. shares are on pace to tie their longest losing streak in more than three decades.】

item.title: 对冲基金Unifi获养老金支持，跻身百亿俱乐部
item.description: 由前One William Street合伙人奥默·贡多杜于去年初创立的对冲基金Unifi Asset Management，已跻身少数几家在新一轮艰难募资环境中突破十亿美元门槛的新晋基金公司之列。【原文：Unifi Asset Management, the hedge fund started by ex-One William Street partner Omer Gundogdu early last year, has joined the small group of newbie firms that have topped the billion-dollar threshold in a tough fundraising climate.】

item.title: 欧洲央行二把手职位吸引六个欧元区国家竞聘
item.description: 六个国家已提交竞选欧洲央行副行长职位的申请，这使得欧元区外围国家得以角逐该地区一个关键的经济职位。【原文：Six countries have placed bids for the vice presidency of the European Central Bank, putting nations from the euro area’s periphery in competition for one of the region’s key economic posts.】

item.title: US Household Worth Climbs to Fresh Record on Stock Market Rally
item.description: 随着股市持续上涨，美国家庭财富在第三季度攀升至历史新高。【原文：US household wealth rose in the third quarter to a fresh record as the stock market continued to rally.】

item.title: 乌克兰铁路公司暂停即将到期的债券利息支付以保留现金
item.description: 乌克兰铁路公司正"暂时"暂停其2026年和2028年到期美元债券的票息支付，因俄罗斯近四年的全面入侵已使其财政陷入困境。【原文：Ukrainian Railways is “temporarily” suspending coupon payments on its dollar bonds due in 2026 and 2028 as Russia’s nearly four-year full-scale invasion ravages its finances.】

item.title: 漂流油轮揭示特朗普重振委内瑞拉石油计划面临重大障碍
item.description: 一艘油轮在委内瑞拉附近的加勒比海域蜿蜒航行，凸显出在美方逮捕总统尼古拉斯·马杜罗后，该国提升石油产量面临的重重障碍。【原文：A tanker meandering in the Caribbean near Venezuela underscores the steep hurdles to ramping up the country’s oil production following the US capture of President Nicolás Maduro.】

item.title: Chevron Could See $700 Million-a-Year Boost From Venezuelan Oil
item.description: 一位分析师表示，随着特朗普政府试图控制委内瑞拉的原油供应，雪佛龙公司通过增加该国石油产量，每年可使现金流增加高达7亿美元。【原文：Chevron Corp. could grow its cash flow by as much as $700 million a year from increasing oil production in Venezuela as the Trump administration seeks to control the South American country’s crude supplies, one analyst says.】

item.title: 亚当斯街牵头军事装备企业私募债务交易
item.description: 亚当斯街合伙公司牵头完成一笔高达4亿美元的私募信贷融资，用于支持两家投资公司收购航空航天与国防设备企业博福特。【原文：Adams Street Partners led a private credit financing of as much as $400 million to back the acquisition by two investment firms of aerospace and defense equipment business Beaufort.】

item.title: 礼来支持的Aktis公司美国IPO募资3.18亿美元后股价飙升50%
item.description: Aktis Oncology Inc.股价在上市首日飙升50%，此前这家临床阶段生物技术公司通过首次公开募股筹集了3.177亿美元。【原文：Aktis Oncology Inc. shares jumped 50% in their trading debut after the clinical-stage biotechnology company raised $317.7 million in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉投资者关注600亿美元债券重组启动
item.description: 一群全球投资者表示，他们已准备好就600亿美元违约的委内瑞拉债券展开谈判，这是全球最大、最复杂的政府债务重组之一的第一步。【原文：A group of global investors said it stands ready to start talks over $60 billion of defaulted Venezuelan bonds, a first step in one of the world’s largest and most complex government debt restructurings】

item.title: 据称I Squared放弃收购斯特罗广告公司旗下广告牌业务
item.description: An investor group led by I Squared Capital has dropped its pursuit of German media group Ströer SE & Co.’s core advertising business, people with knowledge of the matter said.

item.title: 银行为Hillenbrand杠杆收购推出18亿美元杠杆贷款
item.description: 由美国银行和瑞银集团牵头的银行财团已启动一笔18亿美元的杠杆贷款交易，用于资助收购美国塑料部件和设备制造商Hillenbrand公司。【原文：Banks led by Bank of America Corp. and UBS Group AG have kicked off a $1.8 billion leveraged-loan deal to help fund the buyout US plastic-parts and equipment maker Hillenbrand Inc.】

item.title: 裕信银行计划增持阿尔法银行股份至32.1%
item.description: 裕信银行通过多种金融工具额外持有阿尔法银行2.3%的股份，此举将使其在该希腊银行的总持股比例提升至约32.1%。【原文：UniCredit holds an extra 2.3% of Alpha Bank through various financial instruments, a move that will enable it to boost its total stake in the Greek lender to around 32.1%.】

item.title: Trump Posted Unpublished Jobs Data Early on Social Media
item.description: President Donald Trump posted a chart on social media Thursday evening that included figures in the yet-to-be released December employment report.

item.title: 伊朗威胁对示威者判处死刑，镇压行动不断升级
item.description: 伊朗官员在全国范围内加紧镇压抗议活动，威胁参与者将面临死刑，而周五晚间预计将出现更多骚乱。【原文：Iranian officials intensified a crackdown on protests across the country, threatening participants with the death penalty amid expectations of further unrest on Friday night.】

item.title: 奥克洛和维斯特拉股价飙升，因Meta转向核能为人工智能供能
item.description: Oklo Inc. and Vistra Corp. shares rallied, leading peers higher, after Meta Platforms Inc. agreed to a purchase nuclear power from the companies to run artificial-intelligence data centers.

item.title: US Natural Gas Futures Decline on Mild Mid-January Outlook
item.description: Us natural gas futures dipped as forecasts showed mild temperatures over much of the US, dampening demand for the heating fuel.

item.title: 以下是美国12月就业报告的关键要点
item.description: 以下是周五发布的12月美国就业报告中的关键要点：【原文：Here are the key takeaways from the December US employment report, released Friday:】

item.title: 健康追踪牙刷、护齿套以夸张宣传吸引消费者
item.description: 若你足够留心，就会发现本周CES展会上随处可见健康追踪器。但它们的外观未必符合你的预期。【原文：If you paid enough attention, you could find health trackers everywhere at the CES trade show this week. But they didn't necessarily look how you’d expect.】

item.title: 美国消费者信心指数升至四个月高点，经济因素推动
item.description: US consumer sentiment rose in recent weeks on slightly more upbeat views about the economy as tariff concerns fade.

item.title: 塞内加尔国债飙升，总统再次排除债务重组可能性
item.description: 塞内加尔总理乌斯曼·桑科再次拒绝债务重组后，该国美元债券价格飙升。他表示，这个西非国家将依靠国内市场来筹集预算资金和偿债成本。【原文：Senegal’s dollar bonds surged after Prime Minister Ousmane Sonko again rejected a debt restructuring, saying the West African nation would rely on domestic markets to finance its budget and debt-servicing costs.】
